experiences.title: Web Developer
experiences.subtitle: Verizeo-Microsoft
workDescription: Developed a responsive housing website using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Bootstrap to enhance user experience across different devices.
Integrated MySQL database for managing property listings, user data, and search functionality, improving data accessibility and user interaction.

experiences.title: Web Developer
experiences.subtitle: Chegg
workDescription: Developed a sleek, user-friendly portfolio for a photographer, featuring optimized photo galleries and a fully responsive design for all device types.
Utilized Vue.js for dynamic front-end interactions, with Java and SQL for backend data management, ensuring seamless performance and functionality.
